name: Blog
details: Developed a MERN blog application that allows users to read and create blogs under authenticated accounts.
Designed and implemented a comprehensive user interface featuring a secure login and registration page with JWT authentication, home page, categories page, author page, profile page, and blogs page.
Used Google Cloud Buckets for secure storage.

name: Course Enrollment
details: Developed a CRUD application that allowed students to see and leave reviews for courses.
Sections include a login, course search, user-specific reviews, and course-specific reviews.

name: Virtual Memory Allocation
details: Simulated OS assignment of physical memory to virtual memory.
Allocated and translated memory into multi-leveled page tables, with a configurable number of levels and size.
